GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Kit Conversion Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Convert kits into items based on records in USR_PACK_CONVERSION table (Mangage Catalog/Kit Conversion)
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_KITCONVERSION ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @CATALOGREVENUESELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @I_MAX integer declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate DECLARE @CATALOGREVENUESELECTION TABLE (id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @CATALOGREVENUESELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@CATALOGREVENUESELECTIONID)
declare @T table ( PK int identity(1,1), CATALOGREVENUEID uniqueidentifier, CATALOGCODE nvarchar(50), INITIALQUANTITY integer, INDIVIDUALITEMCODE nvarchar(50), QUANTITYMULTIPLIER integer, CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier, CHANGEDATE datetime ) declare @I int = 1
insert into @T select CR.ID, CIA.CATALOGCODE, CR.QUANTITY, kits.itemcode, kits.quantity, CR.CHANGEDBYID, CR.DATECHANGED from dbo.USR_CATALOGREVENUE CR inner join dbo.USR_CATALOGITEMATTRIBUTE CIA on cia.id = cr.catalogitemattributeid inner join dbo.REVENUE R on R.id = cr.revenueid inner join @CATALOGREVENUESELECTION SelectionResults on SelectionResults.ID = r.ID inner join USR_PACK_CONVERSION kits on kits.kitcode = cia.catalogcode where -- not processed CR.QUANTITY <> 0 and CR.FULFILLED = 0
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @T
declare @CATALOGREVENUEID uniqueidentifier declare @CATALOGCODE nvarchar(50) declare @INITIALQUANTITY integer declare @INDIVIDUALITEMCODE nvarchar(50) declare @QUANTITYMULTIPLIER integer declare @CATALOGREVENUECHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier declare @CHANGEDATE datetime
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE while @I <= @I_MAX begin
select @CATALOGREVENUEID = CATALOGREVENUEID, @CATALOGCODE = CATALOGCODE, @INITIALQUANTITY = INITIALQUANTITY, @INDIVIDUALITEMCODE = INDIVIDUALITEMCODE, @QUANTITYMULTIPLIER = QUANTITYMULTIPLIER, @CATALOGREVENUECHANGEAGENTID = CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEDATE = CHANGEDATE from @T where PK = @I
begin begin try
insert into USR_CATALOGREVENUE ( TRANSACTIONID, CATALOGITEMATTRIBUTEID, QUANTITY, PRICE, FAIRMARKET, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, --TS, --TSLONG, FULFILLED, REVENUEID, ADDRESSID, SHIPTONAME, TAXAMOUNT, CATALOGITEMID, CATALOGTYPEID, FROMNAME, SHIPTOFIRSTNAME, SHIPTOLASTNAME, SHIPTOADDRESS1, SHIPTOADDRESS2, SHIPTOCITY, SHIPTOSTATEID, SHIPTOCOUNTRYID, SHIPTOZIP, SHIPPINGOPTION, SHIPPINGPRICE, SHIPPINGATTENTION, SHIPPINGINSTRUCTIONS, PERSONALNOTE, SHIPPINGPRICEACTUAL, SHIPDATE, ISSHIPPED, TRACKINGNUMBER, FULFILLMENTNUMBER ) select TRANSACTIONID, (select id from usr_catalogitemattribute where catalogcode = @INDIVIDUALITEMCODE and inactive=0), @INITIALQUANTITY * @QUANTITYMULTIPLIER, --PRICE (force price to be zero when breaking out so don't double charge), 0, --FAIRMARKET (force fair market to be zero when breaking out so don't double charge), 0, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, --TS, --TSLONG, 0, REVENUEID, ADDRESSID, SHIPTONAME, --TAXAMOUNT (force tax amount to be zero when breaking out so don't double charge), 0, --CATALOGITEMID, (select catalogitemid from usr_catalogitemattribute where catalogcode = @INDIVIDUALITEMCODE and inactive=0), --CATALOGTYPEID, (select catalogtypeid from usr_catalogitem where id = (select catalogitemid from usr_catalogitemattribute where catalogcode = @INDIVIDUALITEMCODE and inactive=0)), FROMNAME, SHIPTOFIRSTNAME, SHIPTOLASTNAME, SHIPTOADDRESS1, SHIPTOADDRESS2, SHIPTOCITY, SHIPTOSTATEID, SHIPTOCOUNTRYID, SHIPTOZIP, SHIPPINGOPTION, SHIPPINGPRICE, SHIPPINGATTENTION, SHIPPINGINSTRUCTIONS, PERSONALNOTE, SHIPPINGPRICEACTUAL, SHIPDATE, ISSHIPPED, TRACKINGNUMBER, FULFILLMENTNUMBER from USR_CATALOGREVENUE where id = @CATALOGREVENUEID
-- ONLY DO THIS ON FIRST ITEM, WHICH IS REQUIRED set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED + @@ROWCOUNT;
update USR_CATALOGREVENUE set FULFILLED = 1 where id = @CATALOGREVENUEID and FULFILLED <> 1
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch end
set @I = @I + 1 --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE end
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
